Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in the large intestine, kidney liver, gall bladder, testis, ovary and male and female reproductive tracts. Expressed in the ovarian stroma and the theca and granulosa layers of the ovarian follicle. Developmental stage
